text: Mugihe yashika kurugero rw’ukugenda nukugaruka ari kumwe nawe niho yamubwira ati:- ewe kibondo canje, mu vy’ukuri jewe nabonye mundoto zanje yuko no kubaga, rero nawe niwiyumvire neza, none wewe ubibona gute? Nawe amwishura ati:- ewe data wanje nugire nk’uko wategetswe nanje uzonsanga Imana ibishatse ndimu bantu batenyenya
